column5: Got 2 x 15's and an 8 at sunrise this morning, crank up the pressure canner once more.
they should be starting to make moves now! Wont be long till they are up the creek and ready to be swung on with some flies.
Oh there's a lot in the river already.

Yah, where,when,how,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,, LMAO  1st run ended,many more to come. Poor Ernie ,Larry and Ron were depressed. LMAO  Ya,I bought a tag this year. Off work still, so limited travel. Have caught a few pike for fun. LOL   OH, Nice haul buddy,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,👍
Haven't seen any yet in my tribs. Lovely trophies
Your'e Classic Drifter--Thanks for your post here--haven't laughed this much since March 1st  Take Care Dude  "Take a Dog Fishing'  Paul
Been in the rivers since July    Gotta love those early runs.
Nice fish, buddy.  Wish I was still able to put a few of those up in jars myself! From shore, or out in the boat? Doug
In the boat, was a super calm day, just a ripple on the water.  I  really have to cherry pick the days or the back punishes me.
I was a bit to early to get a jar, as he was just prepping for the canning.  I think I will drop off a catch and share, if he is willing to can for me.
I'll meet you half-way, say Oshawa, both for the drop off and the pick up............😁
I think Brian wants to start a new company,  You catch'em, I can 'em, lol.
But won't they all end up in a braided jacket of bacon? HH
Well, Erichs place is like a drive through for me. LOL
Bacon goes with anything Joe. You know that. LOL

Nice fish fr sure. I wonder if they are hitting out in the lake. Lake Ontario. Big Dave Drifter,  there were some powerful drugs in the late 60's and early 70's when I was in High School and I see they are still available. I did not try any and I didn't smoke anything until grade 13 and I didn't inhale. And yes I walked 8 miles 1 way in 3 feet of snow to get to school. The bus was 10 cents but that dime bought me a burger or fries in the cafeteria at lunch. I always could sell my salami or prosciutto with roasted red pepper or eggplant for 2 burgers and fries. I hated those sangwidges my mangi buddies loved them.
